https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/addit._instruction: Enter any additional remarks concering this specimen set.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/addit.description: Mention of what deserves additional attention or notice.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/addit.label: Additional remarks
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/addit.name: additionalRemarks

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/biolo._instruction: Add the biological sex of all specimen in this set.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/biolo.description: Differentiation of individuals of most species (animals and plants) based on the type of gametes they produce.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/biolo.label: Biological sex
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/biolo.name: biologicalSex

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/inter._instruction: Enter the identifier (or label) of this specimen set that is used within the corresponding data files to identify this specimen set.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/inter.description: Term or code that identifies someone or something within a particular product.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/inter.label: Internal identifier
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/inter.name: internalIdentifier

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/looku._instruction: Enter a lookup label for this specimen set that may help you to find this instance more easily.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/looku.label: Lookup label
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/looku.name: lookupLabel

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/numbe._instruction: Enter the number of subjects that belong to this subject group.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/numbe.label: Number of subjects
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/numbe.name: numberOfSubjects

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/speci._instruction: Add the species and/or strain (a sub-type of a genetic variant of species) of all specimen in this set.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/speci.description: Category of biological classification comprising related organisms or populations potentially capable of interbreeding, and being designated by a binomial that consists of the name of a genus followed by a Latin or latinized uncapitalized noun or adjective.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/speci.label: Species
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/speci.name: species

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/studi._instruction: Add all states in which this subject group was studied.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/studi.description: Reference to a point in time at which something or someone was studied in a particular mode or condition.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/studi.label: Studied state
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/studi.name: studiedState
